column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Walked in on a Saturday night around 630pm. The spot was pretty busy. We had an hour and a half wait. Thankfully
column2: it only Ended up being a 40 minute wait. We were seated in the back right if the restaurant
column3: but my group and I ended up moving ourselves to a different table. The Corner we were originally seated had a heck of a fly problem. They were even inside the parmasian shakers. The pizza came out about 30 minutes after we ordered
column4: which wasn't bad. The deep dish pizza was ok
column5: but didn't make up for the unclean environment. Definitely not the spot for a the best deepdish spot in chicago. The Hunt continues
